objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel forming the base of the booth, constructed with a thin but sturdy slab featuring a smooth, neutral-tone finish that provides a subtle backdrop for other elements. The slight thickness ensures structural stability while maintaining a sleek, minimalist aesthetic.

A tall, rectangular planar wall forming the front boundary of the booth, with a smooth, matte surface and neutral coloration that provides a clean backdrop while offering visual privacy and structural definition.

A tall, rectangular planar wall forming the back boundary of the booth, with a smooth, matte surface and neutral coloration that provides a clean backdrop while offering visual privacy and structural definition.

A tall, rectangular planar wall forming the left boundary of the booth, with a smooth, matte surface and neutral coloration that provides a clean backdrop while offering visual privacy and structural definition.

A tall, rectangular planar wall forming the right boundary of the booth, with a smooth, matte surface and neutral coloration that provides a clean backdrop while offering visual privacy and structural definition.

A modern rectangular reception counter with clean lines and a minimalistic silhouette. The front face features a smooth panel painted in a warm inviting orange hue, creating an approachable focal point for greeting visitors. The sturdy tabletop offers a functional surface for brochures or electronic displays.

A sleek vertical display shelf with three open tiers supported by a slender frame. Each horizontal surface provides ample platform for showcasing products or literature, finished in a bright, eye-catching color that draws visitor attention.

A round table with a smooth circular top and a slim cylindrical base. The tabletop has a clean, matte finish suitable for casual discussions or small group interactions.

children.specification: A comfortable visitor chair featuring a square seat and straight backrest, supported by slender legs. The design is modern and lightweight, with a glossy finish in a vivid accent color to complement the surrounding furniture.

objects.specification: A small square platform slightly elevated from the floor, featuring a reinforced base and smooth top surface. Designed to serve as a demonstration area or focal point, it has a neutral finish to complement various presentations.

A thin rectangular ceiling panel suspended above the booth interior. It provides structural support for acoustic elements and mounting points for decorative banners and lighting fixtures, finished in a soft neutral tone.

children.specification: A decorative hanging banner composed of lightweight fabric, showcasing a vibrant red color. The banner is rectangular with a slightly curved bottom edge, creating a dynamic visual accent above display areas.
